snippet: While holding its benchmark interest rate at its already record low, the bank indicated it might act next month to spur the euro zone’s economy.

byline.original: By JACK EWING and JAMES KANTER

lead_paragraph: While holding its benchmark interest rate at its already record low, the bank indicated it might act next month to spur the euro zone’s economy.

headline.main: European Central Bank Says Stimulus Is Likely, but Not Before June
headline.print_headline: European Central Bank Says Stimulus Is Likely, but Not Before June
